mdRecord.dcterms:title: Krigs theatreni i America, 1777 : seat of war in America, 1777
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This map of southern New England and the mid-Atlantic region appears in a Swedish-language gazetteer of the British Colonies titled "Beskrifning oÌˆfver de engelska colonierne i Nord-America," (Stockholm : Tryckt i Kongl. Tryckeriet, 1777). The map itself identifies towns and cities, county boundaries in the mid-Atlantic states, and major roads.
